description: Common CPT codes organized by category

99201.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of a new patient, which requires a straightforward medical decision making
99201.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are self limited or minor

99202.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of a new patient, which requires a straightforward medical decision making
99202.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are of low to moderate severity

99203.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of a new patient, which requires a low level of medical decision making
99203.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are of moderate severity

99204.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of a new patient, which requires a moderate level of medical decision making
99204.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are of moderate to high severity

99205.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of a new patient, which requires a high level of medical decision making
99205.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are of high severity

99211.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient
99211.requirements: May not require the presence of a physician or other qualified health care professional

99212.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient, which requires straightforward medical decision making
99212.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are self-limited or minor

99213.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient, which requires a low level of medical decision making
99213.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are of low to moderate severity

99214.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient, which requires a moderate level of medical decision making
99214.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are of moderate to high severity

99215.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient, which requires a high level of medical decision making
99215.requirements: Presenting problem(s) are of high severity

99381.description: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions

99382.description: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management

99383.description: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management

99384.description: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management

99385.description: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management

99386.description: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management

99387.description: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management

99391.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management

99392.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management

99393.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management

99394.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management

99395.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management

99396.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management

99397.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management

laboratory.36415: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture
laboratory.81001: Urinalysis, by dip stick or tablet reagent

vaccines_and_immunizations.90471: Immunization administration for percutaneous, intradermal, subcutaneous, or intramuscular injection; 1 vaccine
vaccines_and_immunizations.90715: Tetanus, diphtheria toxoids and acellular pertussis vaccine

radiology.73564: Radiologic examination, knee; 4 or more views

complexity_levels.straightforward: Minimal problems + Minimal/NONE data + Minimal risk
complexity_levels.low: Low problems + Limited data + Low risk
complexity_levels.moderate: Moderate problems + Moderate data + Moderate risk
complexity_levels.high: High problems + Extensive data + High risk

coding_guidelines: E/M codes are selected based on level of medical decision making OR total time
MDM includes: Number/complexity of problems, Amount/complexity of data, Risk of complications
Time includes: face-to-face and non-face-to-face time on date of encounter
Must document medical necessity for all services
Use modifier 25 for significant, separately identifiable E/M service on same day as procedure
